summary: CAR SHAKES WHEN BREAKING AT HIGH SPEEDS, CAR SOUND SYSTEM SHUTS OFF AND BLINKED NOISES STOP. ABS, EBRAKE LIGHT, AND TRACTION CONTROL LIGHT COME ON. SCREEN BEHIND WHEEL DISPLAYS "SERVICEABLE STABILITRAK" AND "SERVICE TRACTION CONTROL" MESSAGES. VEHICLE IS IN MOTION AND BRAKES ARE USUALLY BEING PRESSED. SHAKING OF VEHICLE HAPPENS ON THE HIGHWAY AND MESSAGES AND LIGHT APPEAR WHILE ON CITY STREETS.
